articles.title: Former Love Island contestant says show used him like a performing monkey - Daily Mail
articles.description: After Niall Aslam left the villa, there were widespread concerns that someone with autism should have been exposed to the ridicule and sexual rejection that is all part of Love Island.

articles.title: Diplomat's wife who inspired "The Serpent" turned detective to help cage serial killer - Mirror Online
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Angela Knippenberg believes the drama underplays her role in helping to convict Charles Sobhraj who murdered at least 12 people in the 1970s in South-East Asia
articles.content:
